thread.title: Lunch - 'a special offer' which lived up to expectations
thread.title_full: Lunch - 'a special offer' which lived up to expectations - Review of The Goring, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Elizabeth W
title: Lunch - 'a special offer' which lived up to expectations
text:
3 courses and a glass of champagne for Â£49.00. An elegant dining room, excellent service and delicious food.
Obviously the menu was limited given this was a 'promotion' but the choice was imaginative. My lobster omelette was extremely tasty. My dining partner rated her lamb very highly. Service was faultless.
